https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iOeqYCp9NXJb97ALrdcQMASQgs6.jpg This is a documentary film chronicling the brutal Honour Killing of Banaz Mahmod, a young British Kurdish woman in London, killed by her own family for choosing a life for herself. Banaz: A Love Story
